boardgame.name: Dungeon Command: Sting of Lolth
boardgame.description: Dungeon Command: Sting of Lolth is a card-driven skirmish game played on modular interlocking map tiles that uses order cards, creature cards and miniatures. The object of the game is to have the highest remaining Morale when an opposing warband's Morale has been reduced to 0 or below, or if a player ends his or her turn with no creatures on the battlefield._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As a player, you take on the role of a commander, sending a warband to battle the forces arrayed against you. You recruit troops and deploy them on the battlefield. You issue orders to those creatures, outfit them with spells and equipment, and direct their tactics to break the morale of your enemies and drive them from the field._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Dungeon Command: Sting of Lolth includes twelve miniatures, such as an assassin, a priestess, a wizard, spiders, and drow house guards. While each Dungeon Command faction is meant to be played by a single player, quick-start rules allow two players to engage in a shortened version of the game using only one box. Dungeon Command is designed for two players, although up to four can play with a few adjustments explained under the advanced rules._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Integrates with:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dungeon Command: Blood of Gruumsh_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dungeon Command: Curse of Undeath_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dungeon Command: Heart of Cormyr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dungeon Command: Tyranny of Goblins_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Can also integrate with:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons: Castle Ravenloft Board Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons: The Legend of Drizzt Board Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons: Wrath of Ashardalon Board Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons: Temple of Elemental Evil Board Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

NEW SET WITHOUT ORDER CARDS. You pick any store you want - one you have credit in, one you want to buy anything else from - and we make an order shipped to your place. When it arrives you ship the order cards to me (Poland). I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m interested in all sets, so we_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll save on shipping. You make an order and I reimbruse you the difference or vice versa. The offer is based on the current price in csinc of 28$ and subject to scale according to the actual price in the store of your choosing.

Condition: Like New - un-played. All pieces in original packaging. Game is complete with no physical damage to any of the components. I charge actual shipping. Take a look at my other games for combine shipping. For US Orders: Shipping methods for domestic (US) orders is Parcel Post (UPS or USPS). Submit zip code for shipping cost. For International Orders: Paypal only. Before purchasing, I strongly suggest that you request a shipping quote. Shipping costs are based on weight and destination and will include insurance. International orders will be shipped USPS Priority Mail International or USPS International Air Mail which can take up to two 2 to 4 weeks to arrive. For questions I can be reached by e-mail at lglauner@charter.net

Opened but unplayed. Cards are out of shrink, but punchboard is unpunched. Box, which is very thin cardboard, does show a few marks (some short, slight creasing, and some rounding on a couple corners), which were present while the game was still in shrink. Components show little to no wear. Cards do show a slight curvature, which was present while in shrink--nothing that would affect play, but something I thought I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d mention in the interest of full disclosure. Shipping cost to be my actual cost to ship from 95008. Local pickup in San Jose, CA, is available as well. Thanks!
